title: OMGZ I IZ GOT A TALL HAT :D
content:
I personally doubt this was intended as an emoticon, but it's fun to think it was

[http://cityroom.blogs.nytimes.com/2009/01/19/hfo-emoticon/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106083930/http:/cityroom.blogs.nytimes.com/2009/01/19/hfo-emoticon/ "http://cityroom.blogs.nytimes.com/2009/01/19/hfo-emoticon/")

(Sorry if this was posted earlier this year)
author: FeeltheKern

comments.content:
Love the Abe emoticon at the end: ==|;o)\>

I'm not sure the "o" best represents Lincoln's face, though -- his face-shape is much more drawn and angular. maybe ==|;¬)\> would work better.
